snippet: Why do free-market economists want a price floor?
abstract: Why do free-market economists want a price floor?
lead_paragraph: Well, I see that Bill Gross is still demanding that we fight the slump by ... raising interest rates. I wish I could say that he had no support; there are, in fact, a lot of Very Serious People demanding a rate rise, and a growing number of stories about the plight of savers.
